resources.string: If you want to reset your password, please enter your registered email address. A confirmation letter will be sent to that address.

When reinstalling the app on the same device, you can retrieve the old information if the previous phone number was identified correctly
 
 When changing a device or phone number, you must log in by an email address to retrieve the previous information.
 
 You are able to sign up for your email by going to Settings -> Account Management -> Subscribe to emails in the MLM application
 
 If you cannot sign up for email on your old device, you will need to create a new account.
